entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
